findings.details: Added hover/focus-within elevation to reinforce keyboard navigation and scannability in the hero latest-posts block.
Network checks are restricted in this run; no automated link validation performed.
Site-level SEO and structured data remain consistent; no changes required in this run.
Recent posts section remains concise and well structured; visual hierarchy enhanced with focus styling.

recommendations: Run a full external link validation when network access is available
Continue refining homepage focus states to support keyboard users
